we have walked to and fro
that they might walk to and fro
so they walked to and fro
but I scattered them with a whirlwind
so that no one passed through
and I will cause to possess
And it shall come to pass
because of him who passes by
and they shall be filled [with blood]
and shall be put to shame
and I will bring them back
And I will bring them back
they shall walk up and down
And it shall come to pass
And it shall come to pass
And it shall come to pass
and Jerusalem shall be raised up
And it shall come to pass
And it shall come to pass
